Package food

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
food.Menu
public class Menu extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu()
    Creates an empty menu with no discounts.
    Menu(double genericDiscout, double mealOfTheWeekDiscount)
    Creates an empty menu (no dishes or meals) with specified general and special discounts.
    Menu(Set<Starter> starters, Set<MainDish> mainDishes, Set<Dessert> desserts, Set<Meal> meals, double genericDiscout, double mealOfTheWeekDiscount)
    Creates a menu with specified sets of starters, main dishes, desserts, and meals, along with specified general and special discounts.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu(Set<Starter> starters, Set<MainDish> mainDishes, Set<Dessert> desserts, Set<Meal> meals, double genericDiscout, double mealOfTheWeekDiscount)
      Creates a menu with specified sets of starters, main dishes, desserts, and meals, along with specified general and special discounts.
      Parameters:
      starters - the set of starters to include in the menu
      mainDishes - the set of main dishes to include in the menu
      desserts - the set of desserts to include in the menu
      meals - the set of meals to include in the menu
      genericDiscout - the general discount rate to apply
      mealOfTheWeekDiscount - the special discount rate for the meal of the week

    • Menu

      public Menu(double genericDiscout, double mealOfTheWeekDiscount)
      Creates an empty menu (no dishes or meals) with specified general and special discounts.
      Parameters:
      genericDiscout - the general discount rate to apply
      mealOfTheWeekDiscount - the special discount rate for the meal of the week

    • Menu

      public Menu()
      Creates an empty menu with no discounts.
